channel.title: Auxy has just hit 4000 followers!
channel.description:
![2019-11-25%2019_31_11-Auxy%20_%20Free%20Listening%20on%20SoundCloud|369x236](upload://9eFib0cK2jzaHjdbelVfmhbZ7JD.png) ![2019-11-25%2019_31_17-Auxy%20_%20Free%20Listening%20on%20SoundCloud|291x51](upload://t3WRTzUsZOXozsCsOqigxwkzcdH.png)
Auxy has grown another thousand followers since it's last thousand-follower milestone in April 18, 2018. Congratulations to the community for continuing to showcase the ever increasing capabilities of Auxy and to @Auxy and @Fredrik for your groundbreaking developments in the iOS music production field. Cheers to a thousand more! :clinking_glasses:
